articles.description: Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah is not being distracted by contract talks and speculation about his future, says manager Arne Slot.
articles.title: Mohamed Salah contract: Liverpool forward not distracted by contract talks - Slot

articles.description: After Marnus Labuschagne's failures in the first Test with India, BBC Sport examines his slump and the issues with Australia's other batters.
articles.title: Australia vs India: Marnus Labuschagne to be axed for second Test?

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at Manchester City's recent transfer dealings and asks if they should be active in January - and who they could sign.
articles.title: Man City January transfer window: Golden touch is under scrutiny

articles.description: Will O'Rourke was born in Surrey, has an action like a "newborn giraffe" and has made an impression in Test cricket. Now he is set to take on England.
articles.title: Will O'Rourke: The Surrey-born New Zealand pace bowler taking on England

articles.description: Social media has been abuzz with talk of a new football league over the past 24 hours. What is Baller League? And why is there so much intrigue?
articles.title: Baller League: KSI, Gary Lineker, Luis Figo & John Terry among names involved in new football league

articles.description: Viktor Gyokeres is on target to break Lionel Messi's record-breaking goalscoring season. But can he do it?
articles.title: Viktor Gyokeres: Can Sporting striker match Lionel Messi's record goal-scoring season?

articles.description: Quarterback Lamar Jackson stars as Baltimore Ravens seal a 30-23 victory against the Los Angeles Chargers in the latest edition of the 'Harbaugh Bowl'.
articles.title: Los Angeles Chargers 23-30 Baltimore Ravens: Lamar Jackson leads Ravens to victory

articles.description: BBC Sport's Nedum Onuoha travels to Italy to sample a classic Milanese dinner with AC Milan striker Tammy Abraham while catching up on what life has been like for the forward playing in Italy since his move from Chelsea.
articles.title: Away Goals: AC Milan's Tammy Abraham on life and playing in Italy

articles.description: Joe Root says Darren Lehmann is "entitled to say what he wants" after the former Australia coach claimed England's leading runscorer is a "rung below" the all-time greats.
articles.title: Joe Root on Darren Lehmann comments: 'I'll do my job, he can do his'

articles.description: Bundee Aki or Sione Tuipulotu? Jac Morgan or Tom Curry? The analysts at Opta have crunched the numbers to produce a Lions XV based on autumn performances.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: The team of the autumn - according to the data
